cbinstall.description: Thank you for supporting Community Builder free open-source development! This plugin allows you to adjust setting for the CB Footer in Community Builder Configuration - Integrations tab

param.translated-default: The setting is located in Community Builder Configuration, Integrations tab
param.label: SETTINGS
